reviews.name: NOT Pizza Peku
reviews.review: The best pizza in the business.

reviews.name: Pirkka-Pekka P.
reviews.review: It was okay, I guess

reviews.name: Matt W.
reviews.review: Good pizza, fast enough delivery.

reviews.name: E. Macs
reviews.review: Not bad for a minimum wage worker! Vai mitä? Täh?

reviews.name: Glontzu the Magnificent
reviews.review: The pizza was fine, but the delivery person drove straight into my house!

reviews.name: John Doe
reviews.review: Pizza was decent, not the best but not the worst either. Delivery was on time, though.

reviews.name: Kaanic
reviews.review: I'm pretty sure that the delivery guy killed someone on their way here... Fast delivery!

reviews.name: Janika S.
reviews.review: Kössi the cat did not approve of the pizza.

reviews.name: Petri Kuittinen
reviews.review: I could have scripted my Emacs to fetch this pizza faster!

reviews.name: Grumpy Grandma
reviews.review: I could have walked over there and gotten the pizza myself faster than that

reviews.name: Leevi P. Pulla
reviews.review: The pizza was handed to me without a word. Terrible service!

reviews.name: Seppo Taalasmaa
reviews.review: Pizza was cold but at least it was not moldy

reviews.name: Philip J. Fry
reviews.review: I wish I had a time machine for all the waiting I had to endure

reviews.name: Benjames B.
reviews.review: When the pizza finally came, it looked like it had been thrown around. Terrible care in handling the order.

reviews.name: Veeti Chang
reviews.review: The pizza was dropped at my door with no knock or ring. I had to go outside to find it! Terrible!

reviews.name: Mario
reviews.review: This delivery was even worse than the pizza itself!

reviews.name: ' OR 1=1; --
reviews.review: I’d rather starve than deal with this joke of a delivery service again.

reviews.name: Luigi
reviews.review: Mama mia!

reviews.name: Skeptical Sam
reviews.review: Is this pizza even edible? I’ve had better meals from my microwave.

reviews.name: Jope R.
reviews.review: Garlic was not even included in the price...

reviews.name: Ryan
reviews.review: How did the delivery even take that long? Did the driver die in the middle?

reviews.name: Makapaka
reviews.review: I ordered a large pizza, but they sent me a tiny one that was barely warm. I’m not paying for this!

reviews.name: Sauli
reviews.review: I could have died, reincarnated, and the pizza would still not gotten here in time

reviews.name: Groovy Gamer
reviews.review: Awful delivery, awful pizza, 0/3
